Description.Name: Artemis IV LRM Ammo
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Artemis IV LRM Ammo Bins each contain 120 rounds and may feed multiple weapons. Artemis IV LRMs have an enhanced guidance system that require an Artemis-equipped launcher but grant a +4 bonus to direct-fire accuracy. Indirect fire accuracy is not affected. Explosion damage per ammo: 2
